Content.Text:
Tonight's the <RED>Starlight Gala</RED>. Maybe I should
invite somebody to come with me.
Invite someone.
Not this time.

Tonight's the <RED>Starlight Gala</RED>. I should invite
<CHARANAME0> to watch the stars with me.

Tonight's the <RED>Starlight Gala</RED>. Let's take the whole
family to go watch the stars.
Not this time.
Who should I invite?
<CHARANAME1>
<CHARANAME2>
<CHARANAME3>
<CHARANAME1>
<CHARANAME2>
<CHARANAME3>
Next
Yeah, let's go invite <CHARANAME0>.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo! What're you doin' here this early?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's right! The <RED>Starlight Gala</RED> is tonight,
isn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Heck yeah, it's more than okay! I'd love to go
with you!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'll wait for you at the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between
<BLUE>18:00 and 20:00</BLUE>. Don't leave me hangin' now,
y'hear?

Okay. I should go to the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between
<BLUE>18:00 and 20:00</BLUE>.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, hello there. What brings you here this fine
morning?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, yes. The <RED>Starlight Gala</RED> is tonight, is it not?
<PAGE>
My schedule for the night is open, and viewing
the stars with you does sound like quite a
pleasant time. Of course I'll go.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'll wait for you at the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between
<BLUE>18:00 and 20:00</BLUE>.

Okay. I should go to the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between
<BLUE>18:00 and 20:00</BLUE>.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey. Good morning. I'm afraid I'm still
setting up the restaurant, but is there anything I
can do for you?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, right. The <RED>Starlight Gala</RED>. So you stopped by
to invite me along, eh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Well, I think I'll take you up on that most
generous offer. Easiest decision I've made all
week.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Let's meet up at the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>18:00
and 20:00</BLUE>, then. Can't wait to see you there!

Okay. I should go to the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between
<BLUE>18:00 and 20:00</BLUE>.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. What business brings you here
this early?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, that's right. The <RED>Starlight Gala</RED> is tonight,
isn't it? I was just wondering if someone might
like to join me for it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Of course I'd love to go with you. We can enjoy
picking out constellations together.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I will await you at the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between
<BLUE>18:00 and 20:00</BLUE>. Don't be late, all right?

Okay. I should go to the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between
<BLUE>18:00 and 20:00</BLUE>.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's you. Still kinda early to drop by, ain't it?

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oooooh, right, right. The <RED>Starlight Gala</RED> is
tonight. I'm not exactly free, but I still wouldn't
mind going with you.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'll wait at the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>18:00 and
20:00</BLUE>. Don't leave me hangin'.

Okay. I should go to the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between
<BLUE>18:00 and 20:00</BLUE>.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
G'morning! What brings you here this early?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh! Right, tonight's the <RED>Starlight Gala</RED>, isn't it?
I'm happy you thought to invite me. It sounds
like a wonderful time.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'll be waiting at the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>18:00
and 20:00</BLUE>, so meet me there.

Okay. I should go to the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between
<BLUE>18:00 and 20:00</BLUE>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
My, what brings you here at this hour? I'm trying
to get my beauty rest, so make it brief.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? Y-you're asking me to go with you to
tonight's <RED>Starlight Gala</RED>? I wasn't particularly
interested in going...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But I certainly have nothing better to do at
home, so I guess I can accompany you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Await me at the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>18:00 and
20:00</BLUE>, and don't keep me waiting.

Okay. I should go to the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between
<BLUE>18:00 and 20:00</BLUE>.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Goodness. It's unusual to see you at this hour of
the morning. What brings you here?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, yes. The <RED>Starlight Gala</RED>. That's tonight, isn't
it? I must've lost track of the days.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Of course I'll join you. Someone has to be there
to make sure you don't stay out too late.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well then, I'll await your gallant arrival at the
<GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>18:00 and 20:00</BLUE>. Don't be
late, now!

Okay. I should go to the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between
<BLUE>18:00 and 20:00</BLUE>.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, good morning! You sure are early today. Did
you need to see me about something?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Huh? You wanna go to the <RED>Starlight Gala</RED> with
me tonight? Um...i-if you're really okay with it,
um...s-sure!
<PAGE>
The night sky here is really super pretty, and I
always have so much fun at the gala I really
can't wait to--ah! S-sorry. I'm babbling.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Aaaaaanyway! Let's meet up at the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN>
between <BLUE>18:00 and 20:00</BLUE>. I can't wait!

Okay. I should go to the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between
<BLUE>18:00 and 20:00</BLUE>.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh! Good morning. What brings you 'round this
early?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tonight's the <RED>Starlight Gala</RED>? Ooooh, watching
the stars together does sound romantic.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Okay! Let's go together!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's meet at the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>18:00
and 20:00</BLUE>. Don't keep a gal waitin' now, okay?

Okay. I should go to the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between
<BLUE>18:00 and 20:00</BLUE>.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. What brings you here at this
early hour?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aah, the <RED>Starlight Gala</RED>. Of course I will go.
<PAGE>
It would probably work best for us to meet
there.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Please come to the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>18:00
and 20:00</BLUE>. I will await your arrival there.

Okay. I should go to the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between
<BLUE>18:00 and 20:00</BLUE>.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh hey, it's you. What's up? This is awful early
for you to poke your head in.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? The <RED>Starlight Gala</RED>? Oh, that's tonight, isn't
it. So you're here to invite me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I guess spending the evening watching the stars
with you could be fun. I'm in.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's meet at the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between <BLUE>18:00
and 20:00</BLUE>. Be there, or be square.

Okay. I should go to the <GREEN>Trade Depot</GREEN> between
<BLUE>18:00 and 20:00</BLUE>.
